plant.question: I have leaves and a stem, and grow in the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water and sunshine
🪴 I can be small or big
🌍 I can be found in a garden

plant.question: I am red, round, and juicy. You can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I grow on a vine
☀️ I am a fruit, but people think of me as a vegetable
❤️  I am often the color of love

plant.question: I have a trunk, branches, and leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very tall
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me
🪵 You can make furniture from me

plant.question: I am a flower that faces the sun. My seeds are a tasty snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I am usually yellow
☀️ I love to follow the sun across the sky
🏈 My seeds can be eaten at a baseball game

plant.question: I am long, green, and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground
🐰  Bugs Bunny loves me
👁️ I am good for your eyesight

plant.question: I have prickly skin, but my insides are sweet and pink or red. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I grow in hot places
🍉 I'm often eaten in the summer to stay cool
🍹  I have a lot of water inside me

plant.question: I am a tall plant with golden kernels. You can make popcorn from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow in a field
🍿 You can eat me at the movies
🐔 Animals like to eat me too

plant.question: I am a climbing plant that produces sweet, purple or green treats in bunches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow on a vine
🍷 You can make juice from me
🌙 I am shaped like small oval orbs

plant.question: I am a seed that can be ground into flour and made into bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am often grown in large fields
🍞 I am used to make sandwiches
🏭 You need a special machine to turn me into flour

plant.question: I am a green plant with a strong smell. Chefs use me to make food taste yummy! What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am often grown in a garden
🇮🇹 I am used in a lot of Italian food
🍕 I make pizza taste delicious

food.question: I am yellow and curved, monkeys like to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys love to eat me!
💛 I am the color of the sun.
🥣 You can slice me and put me in your cereal.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on a tree. Sometimes I am green. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White loved to eat me.
🥧 You can make pie with me.
👨‍⚕️ An _____ a day keeps the doctor away.

food.question: I am long and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me!
👁️ I am good for your eyesight.
🌱 I grow underground.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or put me on your cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Kittens drink me.
🐮 I come from an animal.
🥣 You can pour me in your cereal.

food.question: I am small and green. People often eat me in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the same color as grass.
👪 You sometimes find multiple of me in a row.
🍲 I am often served as a side vegetable.

food.question: I am made of dough, baked in the oven, and often eaten with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can make a sandwich with me.
🌾 I am made from wheat.
🔥 You need heat to make me.

food.question: I am brown and crunchy, and I grow underground. People like to fry me and eat me with salt. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You might eat me with ketchup!
🥔 I start as a vegetable.
🧂 I taste good with salt.

food.question: I am a sweet treat, often swirled, that melts in your mouth when you lick me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦I can be many different colors and flavors.
☀️ I am usually eaten in the summer.
👅 You lick me.

food.question: I am a mix of fruits, often blended together, that is healthy and delicious. What am I?

hints.text: 🍓 You can add berries to me!
🧊 I am often cold and refreshing.
🍌 You can add a banana to make me thicker.

food.question: I'm a yummy dish with layers. Flat noodles layered with cheese, sauce, and sometimes meat. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I come from Italy.
🔥 I'm baked in the oven.
🧀 I have lots of cheese.
